name: Jetbrains Launcher Reloaded
description: Open your projects in Jetbrains IDEs

preferences.name: Global keyword
preferences.description: Global keyword used by the extension

preferences.name: Shell scripts location
preferences.description: Path to the shell scripts generated by the JetBrains Toolbox app.

preferences.name: Configs location
preferences.description: Path to the configs location where all IDEs store their configuration.

preferences.name: Custom aliases
preferences.description: Custom aliases for the IDEs. Example format: web: webstorm; php: phpstorm;
preferences.default_value: intellij: idea; php: phpstorm; py: pycharm; web: webstorm; go: goland; grip: datagrip;
